sources.title: Aerograd
sources.description: A classic Sovet movie about establiching a fictional city Aerograd (literally "the Aero City") on the Pacific Ocean shore. Very atmospheric, now with English subtitles (download http://www.archive.org/download/aerograd/Aerograd.srt file). See http://imdb.com/title/tt0026040/ for further details.
